success_criteria: Linting passes with zero errors; Unit test suite passes (100%); Code coverage > 80% (new code > 90%).
business_impact: Prevents basic bugs and style issues from entering the main codebase.

success_criteria: Integration test suite passes (>98%); Firestore security rule test suite passes (100%); No new critical/high vulnerabilities found in SAST scan.
failure_action: Block deployment to Staging; Create high-priority bug ticket; Notify team lead.
tools_used: GitHub Actions; Firebase Emulator Suite; Snyk/SonarQube
escalation_procedure: Tech Lead and QA Lead are notified automatically.
business_impact: Prevents integration and security issues from reaching the Staging environment.

trigger_event: Manual trigger for deployment to Production
success_criteria: All automated E2E tests for critical paths pass; Manual verification of high-risk features (e.g., 'dry-run' of purge function) is completed and signed off; Performance benchmarks are met in Staging environment.
failure_action: Abort production deployment; Convene a go/no-go meeting.
tools_used: GitHub Actions; Manual Test Plan Checklist; JMeter
escalation_procedure: CTO and Product Owner are notified.
business_impact: Final quality check to prevent critical issues from impacting production users.
